languages.text: "В детстве я зачитывалась летописями феодального мира Эрбенн-II. Рыцари в сияющих доспехах верхом на дивных скакунах сражались с врагами человечества, а потом пировали... Но на этом мире только серость. И грязь".
languages.translation_comment: On Thassera, on the way to the festival.

traits.locale_text: "В детстве я зачитывалась летописями феодального мира Эрбенн-II. Рыцари в сияющих доспехах верхом на дивных скакунах сражались с врагами человечества, а потом пировали... Но на этом мире только серость. И грязь".

languages.text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."
languages.translation_comment: On Thassera, on the way to the festival.
languages.original_text: "В детстве я зачитывалась летописями феодального мира Эрбенн-II. Рыцари в сияющих доспехах верхом на дивных скакунах сражались с врагами человечества, а потом пировали... Но на этом мире только серость. И грязь".

traits.locale_text: "When I was a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

"As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

languages.text: 「子どもの頃、封建惑星のエルベン・IIの年代記に心を奪われました。輝く鎧をまとった騎士たちが立派な馬にまたがり、人類の敵と戦い、勝利の後には盛大な宴を開くのです…ですが、この惑星にあるのは、灰色と泥だけです」
languages.original_text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

traits.locale_text: 「子どもの頃、封建惑星のエルベン・IIの年代記に心を奪われました。輝く鎧をまとった騎士たちが立派な馬にまたがり、人類の敵と戦い、勝利の後には盛大な宴を開くのです…ですが、この惑星にあるのは、灰色と泥だけです」

languages.text: "Als Kind war ich gefesselt von den Chroniken der Feudalwelt Erbenn II. Ritter in glänzenden Rüstungen, die auf ihren edlen Rössern die Feinde der Menschheit bekämpfen und nach ihren siegen große Gelage abhalten ... Doch auf dieser Welt gibt es nur Grau. Und Schlamm."
languages.original_text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

traits.locale_text: "Als Kind war ich gefesselt von den Chroniken der Feudalwelt Erbenn II. Ritter in glänzenden Rüstungen, die auf ihren edlen Rössern die Feinde der Menschheit bekämpfen und nach ihren siegen große Gelage abhalten ... Doch auf dieser Welt gibt es nur Grau. Und Schlamm."

languages.text: « Dans mon enfance, j'étais captivée par les chroniques du monde féodal d'Erbenn II. Des chevaliers en armure rutilante qui partaient au combat sur leurs fiers destriers pour terrasser les ennemis de l'humanité et organisaient de grands festins après leurs victoires... Mais ce monde n'est que grisaille et boue. »
languages.original_text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

traits.locale_text: « Dans mon enfance, j'étais captivée par les chroniques du monde féodal d'Erbenn II. Des chevaliers en armure rutilante qui partaient au combat sur leurs fiers destriers pour terrasser les ennemis de l'humanité et organisaient de grands festins après leurs victoires... Mais ce monde n'est que grisaille et boue. »

languages.text: «De niña, adoraba leer las crónicas del mundo feudal Erbenn II. Caballeros de reluciente armadura a lomos de majestuosos corceles, luchando contra los enemigos de la Humanidad y celebrando banquetes tras sus victorias... Pero en este mundo solo hay gris. Y barro».
languages.original_text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

traits.locale_text: «De niña, adoraba leer las crónicas del mundo feudal Erbenn II. Caballeros de reluciente armadura a lomos de majestuosos corceles, luchando contra los enemigos de la Humanidad y celebrando banquetes tras sus victorias... Pero en este mundo solo hay gris. Y barro».

languages.text: “我还是个孩子的时候，封建世界埃瑞本二号星的编年史让我着迷不已。故事中的骑士穿着闪亮的盔甲，骑着骏马，与人类之敌战斗。他们凯旋归来，举行宴会。然而，这个世界只有一片灰色……和泥巴。”
languages.original_text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

traits.locale_text: “我还是个孩子的时候，封建世界埃瑞本二号星的编年史让我着迷不已。故事中的骑士穿着闪亮的盔甲，骑着骏马，与人类之敌战斗。他们凯旋归来，举行宴会。然而，这个世界只有一片灰色……和泥巴。”

languages.text: "Çocukken II. Erbenn'in feodal dünya vakayinameleri beni büyülemişti. Asil atlarının üzerinde İnsanlığın düşmanları ile çarpışan parlak zırhlı şövalyeler, zaferlerinin şerefine verilen görkemli ziyafetler... Bu renksiz dünyaysa çamurdan ibaret."
languages.original_text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."

traits.locale_text: "Çocukken II. Erbenn'in feodal dünya vakayinameleri beni büyülemişti. Asil atlarının üzerinde İnsanlığın Düşmanları ile çarpışan parlak zırhlı şövalyeler, zaferlerinin şerefine verilen görkemli ziyafetler... Bu renksiz dünyaysa çamurdan ibaret."

languages.original_text: "As a child, I was captivated by the chronicles of the feudal world Erbenn II. Knights clad in shining armour riding their fine steeds, battling enemies of Humanity, and holding feasts after their victories... But this world has only grey. And mud."
